formattedAddress: 55 East End Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 55 East End Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: We just had our daughter's Bat Mitzvah celebration this June.  Jerry and his crew made the day AMAZING!  The music was a fantastic blend of our requests and songs appropriate for every step of the celebration.  The kids had NO time to be bored or to even sit down much!  The adults were able to to dance to today's Latin and Pop hits, and Jerry even sprinkled in some oldie standards to get every generation on their feet.  MC Gabriel was the fan favorite- the kids were hanging on his words and played every game and did every dance with a smile.  Thank you Jerry and Gabriel!

originalText.text: We had our daughter's Sweet Sixteen party yesterday at Vivo Restaurant in Bayside, Queens.  We met with Jerry and Bella to discuss pricing options a few months before our event.  They're very easy to talk to - - no stress.  Jerry Laskin's team was terrific! They arrived at the venue at the time we'd agreed.  We had a Timeline for the event, but as it sometimes happens some things got changed on the spot, and Jerry's team followed directions perfectly.  The M.C., Greg, was great!  very energetic and he helped us to keep the party alive! he's a great motivator!   Bella took beautiful pictures;  we printed quite a few of them at the venue and everyone loved them, excellent quality and sharp!  We originally had just one song to play for the entire candle lighting ceremony, but Jerry suggested we pick songs for each individual candle - - so glad we did that!  It took us some time to select the individual songs, but everyone enjoyed that detail tremendously because the songs made them feel special!  What else can I say...these guys are pros!  I would absolutely hire Jerry and his team again.  Thanks Jerry for making our event a success!

originalText.text: Our family has used Jerry's entertainers for three different family events.  The first was in Westchester, New York.  It was so amazing that we asked Gabriel (the MC) to come out to Central New Jersey for my son's bar mitzvah.  And that went so well that my brother asked Gabriel and the DJ's and motivators to travel to Springfield Pennsylvania for my nephew's bar mitzvah.  Jerry will work with you on pricing, and has everything organized so you just have to say "I want this, I don't want that."  There is no hard sell - I wanted to provide my own glow sticks and things like that, so I did; my brother didn't want the hassle, so Jerry provided them for his event.  The pic attached to this review is of Gabriel, the MC.  When our son was announced and came into the room, Gabriel picked him up on his shoulder and carried him around the room to get high fives from all of his friends and family.  It was a spectacular entrance!  Bottom line - you will have a great party using Jerry and his entertainers!!
